TopicTitle: KSP 1.0 stock replicas: F-22, F-15, SR-71, Yak-38

Articles.Content:
HELLO THERE!!!!

so when .90 was still a thing, I made series of stock replica crafts. Then 1.0 came along sooooooooooo................

1.0 replicas!!!

here they are all in one video 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vUFl_zKGFBc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

this would be the downloads!!!!

[https://www./folder/jeaoprnhdh2m1//ksp%20crafts](https://www./folder/jeaoprnhdh2m1//ksp%20crafts)

if you want to use these crafts in any youtube video of yours, please inform me and give me a link! thanks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Nice F-15 - for a second I had thought you used my MiG-31....
lol that would have been bad

Downloaded and rep'd.

Always a fan of anything with SR-71's in them ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Can i make a request for the Panavia Tornado GR4 (its a variable geometry wing but skip that leave it fixed for simplicity). I've built one, its close but can't get it quite right.

Huhu ! nice craft ! I going to test them on my last BD-Armory scenario !

Good job . +1 Rep

Edit : Yep ! I tweak your F15 & your SAAB for play with BD-Armory ( Small tweak due to the mass missile added ) & they work pretty well ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I go test some more ! 

Yopyop !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T11:20:31Z" title="05/10/2015 11:20  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**

Thanks for all the support ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
